column1: '''The Heirs of Elendil''' is the chapter from the ''[[The Peoples of Middle-earth]]'' volume
column2: part of ''[[The History of Middle-earth]]'' series
column3: which deals with the descendants of [[Elendil]]. It is the basis of [[Appendix A]] in the published ''[[Lord of the Rings]]''.

column1: [[Category:The Peoples of Middle-earth chapters|Heirs of Elendil]]
